text: Brickellia spinulosa is a North American species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to northern and western Mexico (Chihuahua, Durango, Nuevo León, San Luis Potosí, Jalisco, Zacatecas).Turner, B. L. 1997. The Comps of Mexico: A systematic account of the family Asteraceae, vol. 1 – Eupatorieae. title: Brickellia spinulosa
